about_the_game:
This is a clicker game with the following features:
  • Anti-Auto Clicker
  • Purr Pass
  • Secret Codes (Good & Bad)
  • Cat Customization
  • Upgrades

Planned Features Include:
  • Better Menus
  • 3D Experiences

Possible Experiences (may take a long time to implement):
  • Multiplayer
detailed_description:
This is a clicker game with the following features:
  • Anti-Auto Clicker
  • Purr Pass
  • Secret Codes (Good & Bad)
  • Cat Customization
  • Upgrades

Planned Features Include:
  • Better Menus
  • 3D Experiences

Possible Experiences (may take a long time to implement):
  • Multiplayer

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Anything CPU @ 0.69 GHz or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compatible GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+ or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Core i5 @ 4.20 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any better compatible GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan (10.11) or Better
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Anything CPU @ 6.9 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compatible GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave (10.14) or Better
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Core i5 @ 4.20 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any better compatible GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Lobstpurr

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Anything CPU @ 69 MHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Core i5 @ 4.20 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any better compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
